content: {"name": "Shady Brook Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "https://www.facebook.com/SBBCCharlotte\n* Joshua's Closet is a food pantry on Shady Brook's campus, which provides foods and goods to those in need.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.shadybrook.life/collections/missions", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2940 Belmeade Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Moores Chapel", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28214", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2759188, "longitude": -80.9718743}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 394-0109", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}]}
